item.title: Trump says U.S. destroyed loading dock in Venezuela
item.description: Trump would not say if the military or the CIA conducted the strike in Venezuela amid escalating U.S. pressure on Nicolás Maduro.

item.title: Netanyahu, Trump navigate differences as Middle East tensions rise
item.description: Netanyahu has hailed Trump as the “greatest friend Israel has ever had in the White House.” Now the two must navigate rifts over Middle East strategy.

item.title: How Vance brokered a truce between Trump and Musk
item.description: As Trump’s first year in office comes to a close, both he and his Trump world allies have learned hard lessons about Musk’s unusual influence.

item.title: Duty? Insanity? These former members of Congress want to come back.
item.description: By The Washington Post’s latest tally, at least 18 former members — 11 Democrats and seven Republicans — are asking voters to send them back to D.C. n...

item.title: Trump and Zelensky strike hopeful tone after talks as hurdles remain
item.description: The United States will help facilitate Russia-Ukraine talks in January, as Trump called the peace process “very complicated stuff.”
